result.execSummary:
Robert Earl Thomas was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Robert Earl Thomas was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Earl Thomas

records.addlTxt: 8:19 AM Defendant Robert Earl Thomas not in court.  Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz appeared by video for Robert Earl Thomas.  Attorney Gerald Anthony Urbik in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has been extradited; Court orders case dismissed.
Review hearing on September 30, 2022 at 08:15 am.

11:42 AM Defendant Robert Earl Thomas appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz in court for Robert Earl Thomas.  Attorney David Zarwell in court for the State of Wisconsin.
Review hearing scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:15 am.

3:47 PM Defendant Robert Earl Thomas appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Anna Elizabeth Hartz appeared by video for Robert Earl Thomas.  Attorney David Zarwell in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives extradition; Court accepts waiver. Bond revoked.
Review hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Extradition hearing on August 24, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

11:16 AM Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Robert Earl Thomas appeared by video, in custody at the Rock County Jail. Defendant to contact State Public Defender's Office.
Extradition hearing scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Extradition hearing on August 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.

Activity: Initial appearance 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

4:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Robert Earl Thomas appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Colin T Nicholson appeared by video for Robert Earl Thomas. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Cash bond set of $10,000.00 with conditions. Remand to branch 3 for scheduling.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report
